name: Clobazam

indications.text: clobazam oral suspension indicated adjunctive treatment seizures associated lennox-gastaut syndrome ( lgs ) patients 2 years age older .

contraindications.text: doses 5 mg/day administer two divided doses . ( 2.1 ) patients ≤ 30 kg body weight : initiate 5 mg daily titrate tolerated 20 mg daily . ( 2.1 ) patients > 30 kg body weight : initiate 10 mg daily titrate tolerated 40 mg daily . ( 2.1 ) adjustment needed following groups : geriatric patients ( 2.4 , 8.5 ) known cyp2c19 poor metabolizers ( 2.5 ) mild moderate hepatic impairment ; information severe hepatic impairment ( 2.7 , 8.8 ) oral suspension : taken without food . ( 2.3 )

warningsAndPrecautions: clobazam oral suspension , 2.5 mg/ml , berry flavored off-white liquid.store clobazam oral suspension upright position . available follows : ndc 68094-066-584 ml per unit dose syringefifty ( 50 ) syringes per shipper ndc 68094-074-584 ml per unit dose enfit syringefifty ( 50 ) syringes per shipper
adverseReactions: clobazam oral suspension contraindicated patients history hypersensitivity ingredients . hypersensitivity included serious dermatological [ ( 5.6 ) ] .
indications_original: Clobazam oral suspension is indicated for the adjunctive treatment of seizures associated with Lennox-Gastaut syndrome (LGS) in patients 2 years of age or older.
contraindications_original: For doses above 5 mg/day administer in two divided doses. ( 2.1 ) Patients ≤ 30 kg body weight: Initiate at 5 mg daily and titrate as tolerated up to 20 mg daily. ( 2.1 ) Patients > 30 kg body weight: Initiate at 10 mg daily and titrate as tolerated up to 40 mg daily. ( 2.1 ) Dosage adjustment needed in following groups: Geriatric patients ( 2.4 , 8.5 ) Known CYP2C19 poor metabolizers ( 2.5 ) Mild or moderate hepatic impairment; no information for severe hepatic impairment ( 2.7 , 8.8 ) Oral suspension: Can be taken with or without food. ( 2.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Clobazam oral suspension, 2.5 mg/mL, is a berry flavored off-white liquid.Store clobazam oral suspension in an upright position. It is available as follows:
                  NDC 68094-066-584 ml per unit dose syringeFifty (50) syringes per shipper
                  NDC 68094-074-584 ml per unit dose ENFit syringeFifty (50) syringes per shipper
adverseReactions_original: Clobazam oral suspension is contraindicated in patients with a history of hypersensitivity to the drug or its ingredients. Hypersensitivity reactions have included serious dermatological reactions [see Warnings and Precautions (5.6)].
